div.sent: As a result, sports, games and physical exercises become more attractive.
Through this play the students can learn the ball throwing and catching neatly.
The techniques of bowling of cricket and other games will easily be learned.
The players of A Team will stand feet apart and will throw the ball very high.
Always the ball should be thrown directly towards the opposite players.
At the time of throwing the ball the opposite leg of the throwing hand will come forward.
1) The fingers of both the hands taken together a cup or a funnel is to be made.
2) The ball is to be caught with close fist and firmly.
To catch the ball always keep the eyes on the ball.
The ball should have to be caught with promptness.
A B both the groups should be habituated to catch the hail.
To skip with rope is a delightful game and very useful for the development 0 the body.
Equipment: Skipping rope.
By holding the two ends of the rope with two hands one is to skip with single leg rhythmically.
In between skipping the leg can be changed.
In this way as far as possible practice can be done in one spot or on moving forward.
Some technique discussed above in single leg skipping is to be applied.
The only difference is instead of single leg double leg will be used (Figure B.).
Two players will skip with one rope simultaneously.
When a few stand in a circle one will move a rope round the circle.
All will have to jump over the rope.
Games played with the help of hoops build the habit of perseverance and self control and also give pleasure.
Equipment: Bamboo, cane, steel made hoops or ring.
The diameter of the ring will be 1 8 to 24 inches.
Stand in a ring placed on the ground.
After this maintain balance changing the hand and the foot as sown in the picture.
3, For maintaining balance keep the leg and the hip straight.
Standing in the ring keep weight on the right leg at first, fold the left knee and raise up.
Now as shown in the picture hold the knees with two hands against the chest.
In this way alternately lift the right and left knee and pratise.
During practice of maintaining balance keep the backbone and the hand as for as possible straight.
Firstly one should sit in kneel down position in the ring.
Keeping the breathing natural hold this position for 20-30 seconds.
In this way the practicing for maintenance of balance will be done for 3 to 4 times.
Besides, if one can maintain balance in various ways in the ring as shown in the picture below.
(B) Put a ring in a slanting position towards yourself.
The ring will move in its own orbit by itself.
In this moving ring try to cross through it.
Sometimes jump over to cross it and catch it before t lands on the ground.
The sticks should be 1 to 3 hands long and round with a smooth surface.
After this return to the first position.
In this way practice 3 to 4 times.
Two players will sit on the ground with their legs straight having their feet placed with one another.
Sitting on the ground by bending the knees hold ends of a two hand long stick firmly with two hands.
Relax the body and come to the primary stage and do the exercise for several times.
With feet little apart two players will stand face to face keeping 5 to 6 feet distance from one another.
Immediately he will extend his two hands and hand over the stick to his partner with a small push.
The receiver will always keep his eyes on the stick.
Practise this exercise of stick for several times.
This game can be played by dividing the students into two groups.
Everyone will stand at a distance of 30 to 30 metres.
The stick will remain in the left hand of the first layer.
With the starting signal the first player will start running.
After the change of the stick he will change the stick from his right hand to his left hand.
The time should not be wasted to exchange the stick.
For increasing the strength and development of muscles of the body rope climbing is a romantic feeling.
Through this game courage and tolerance are increased.
These are much needed in life.
The practice is to be done with hanging a rope knotted at a distance of one hand.
Climb up with the help of the hand by the unknotted rope.
The practice of climbing a rope with the help of two hands and two legs.
To hang in a swing rope, to swing in a hanging rope etc. may be practised.
To hang like Tarzan in a swinging rope.
With the help of rope swing like a cradle.
Roll in different posture on a low bench: Equipment: a low bench 18 inches high hand or 5/6 feet long.
All players will stand at one end of the bench in a starting line.
Before the start of roll or somersault two helpers will stand by the two sides of the bench.
With the signal of starting the students will do front roll in turns.
After this they will practise back roll.
Stand on low parallel bars in different ways Parallel bars is a kind of attractive playing equipment.
With its help through body movement the muscles of the body and nerves get conditioned.
Equipment: Low parallel bars and mats which can be made locally by bamboo and wood.
Preparation: First body should be warmed up then all will come to the starting line in a file.
Two persons are to stand as helpers on two sides of the bars.
The two bars of the parallel bars are to be caught with two hands.
With the help of the hands after a mount in parallel bars students will take their position on it.
Parallel bars is to be mounted with the help of pressing the hands.
After a little swing the legs will go over the bars and spread on the two sides of the bars.
After practising from one end to the other end dismount from the bars with a little jump.
Standing on the shoulder and the hands on low parallel bars: The body will be in forward position.
Keeping the weight on the upper part of the arms, the legs should be raised.
The weight of the body will be carried on one shoulder.
In this position two hands will hold the two bars firmly.
Mounting, dismounting and showing different kinds of feats on vaulting box are enjoyable game.
These games develop fastness and physical skill.
Equipment: vaulting box, mat.
These could be made locally with wood.
Two helpers will stand at the take off point and another at the landing point on the mat.
The vaulting box should be placed crosswise to practise the exercises.
After this he will jump down on the mat.
In this way every player will practise several times.
Teach front roll on soft soil or grass before teaching the partner Dive Roll on mat.
After completing his dive roll he will take position as the first player did.
This is the prophet pro cedure to learn dive roll and in it you will find pleasure.
Dive roll can be practiced competitively by dividing students in two groups.
